sections.mainTitle: Your pace, your race, your time

about.title: What is Pitmydoro?
about.description:
Pitmydoro is a focus timer inspired by Formula 1, designed to help you achieve your tasks and goals.



It works perfectly on both desktop and mobile, and its purpose is to help you stay focused whether you're studying, writing, coding, or planning your next goal.



Make the most of the Pomodoro method combined with F1 to make focus more dynamic and motivating.
about.title2: How does the Pomodoro technique work?
about.description2:
The Pomodoro Technique is a time management strategy that divides work into high-focus intervals, typically 25 minutes, followed by short breaks.



In Pitmydoro, each task is part of your race strategy. Each Pomodoro is a lap, and depending on the intensity of your work, you can choose between different "tires": soft, medium, hard, intermediate, or wet, adapting to the conditions of your day.



You can configure the duration of each tire and choose your favorite team to personalize your environment (This can be done from the Settings section).



Short and long breaks are your pit stops, essential to keep you on track and performing at your best.
about.title3: How to start using the Pomodoro technique?

list.1: Add the tasks you need to complete.
list.2: Assign how many pomodoros you think each task will need.
list.3: You can select a specific task to start with.
list.5: Repeat the intervals until you complete 4 pomodoros (or the number you configured).
list.6: Each time you finish a session, take a short break.
list.7: After completing 4 pomodoros, take a longer break.
list.8: Repeat the process until all your tasks are done.

nonF1.title: Not an F1 fan or unfamiliar with the terms?
nonF1.description: No worries, you can use Pitmydoro without being a Formula 1 fan. The app is designed to fit your needs and preferences, regardless of your F1 knowledge.
